title: Manhunt underway after stabbing spree in Saskatchewan leaves several dead, more injured
description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police are on the search for two men after an hours-long mass stabbing event took place Sunday, September 4, in Saskatchewan, Canada. A total--so far--of ten people have been killed by this pair of monsters, with an additional 15 injured.

title: Watch: Car chase ends with crash, gun, and stolen $20,000 in what amounts to a real-life 'Grand Theft Auto'

title: 'It's super cool!': Hyperactive leftist explains frog pronouns because why not at this point...
description: It's been a little while since I've seen a good pronoun video. And it's not that I haven't seen videos of wacky little leftists explaining their moronic pronouns but that they've reached such a level of ridiculous that it takes a truly idiotic one to make me pause for a moment and remember the downward spiral we're in. title: Coal miners push electric vehicle that broke down outside of a coal plant in world's most ironic viral post
description: Warning: your brain may have trouble processing so much irony. Not unlike electric vehicles having trouble processing getting from point A to point B.
